description: Tsunami Maximum Inundation Height (MIH) hazard data at global level for 10 year return period
title: Global Tsunami Hazard GTM RP2500
citation: Davies, G., Griffin, J., Løvholt, F., Glimsdal, S., Harbitz C., Thio, H.K., Lorito, S., Basili, R., Selva, J., Geist, E., and Baptista, M.A. (2017), A global probabilistic tsunami hazard assessment from earthquake sources, Geological Society, London, Special Publications, 456, doi:10.1144/SP456.5
